user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
reflect_result: By scrolling up, the view has shifted to the product detail section of the 2017 Apple MacBook Air. The screen now shows the option to add the item to the shopping cart, with buttons for "Add to Cart" and "Buy Now" clearly visible. This action is a step closer to fulfilling the user request, as the user can now add the MacBook Air to the cart by pressing the "Add to Cart" button. However, the action of scrolling up does not directly show the shopping cart yet, but it makes the item ready to be added, which is the next necessary step to proceed with the user request.
